price: 5 Aucune nouvelle révélation du Tout Miséricordieux ne leur est transmise sans qu’ils ne s’en détournent
arabic: وَمَا يَأۡتِيهِم مِّن ذِكۡرٖ مِّنَ ٱلرَّحۡمَٰنِ مُحۡدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُواْ عَنۡهُ مُعۡرِضِينَ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: wamā yatīhim min dhik'rin mina al-raḥmāni muḥ'dathin illā kānū ʿanhu muʿ'riḍīna
